entries.title: MSI intends 'to continue with Afterburner' overclocking app despite not paying its Russian dev
entries.description: Alexey 'Unwinder' Nicolaychuk called the overclocking application "probably dead" in a forum post, but MSI has told us it has been working on a solution.
